about_the_game:
Unionatic is a unique game that combines captivating village building and strategy elements. Build your own village, manage resources, develop the economy, and strengthen your army. Interact with other players, form alliances, and challenge enemies as you expand your village.



Unionatic offers you the opportunity to create your own unique village. From the beginning, you can choose the necessary buildings to construct your village and manage resources. By constructing buildings such as lumber mills, mines, and farms, you can increase resource production and achieve economic growth. As you expand your village, it is important to consider the environment and plan wisely, utilizing resources efficiently.



Unionatic is a game that requires you to develop strategies and make tactical moves to defend against enemies while improving your village. You can create defense strategies against enemy attacks, position your military units strategically, and repel enemy assaults. Additionally, you can plan and execute raids on enemy territories to increase your resources. By utilizing your tactical intelligence, you can defeat enemies and secure the safety of your village.



Unionatic not only allows you to manage your village but also provides thrilling action scenes where you can directly control your character. You can join the battlefield, engage in combat, and emerge victorious by taking control of your own character. With fast-paced battles and the utilization of your abilities, you will find yourself immersed in an action-packed world.



Unionatic aims to enhance the gaming experience with detailed graphics and impressive sound effects. Embark on a journey in a visually stunning game world where every detail is meticulously crafted for your enjoyment. Atmospheric music and immersive sound effects in the game provide a fully engaging experience that will captivate you.



In Unionatic, you engage in defense and offense against creatures from different races that emerge from the ancient forest, all while maintaining control over your own village. As you establish your village, you must defend against incoming creatures from various locations. You have the option to switch to the TPS mode and fight alongside your armies or manage your armies from a top-down camera perspective.
